name: Lute This!
description:
We highly recommend playing the Windows 64 build.

How to play:
Match the Rhythm with Arrow Keys! (Or WASD!)
Collect loot by moving the Mouse over coins!
If playing in browser and Mouse becomes stuck, Escape may free it.

Created in 3 days for the KJam#1.
This came down to the wire with only minutes left to submit!
Through two all-nighters and multiple major issues,
every single member poured their hearts and souls
into bringing this game to life.

Credits:
Zoped (https://zoped.itch.io/) - Programmer, Designer
Sand - Programmer, Designer
SaltMonger (https://saltmonger.itch.io/) - Music, Programmer
BlasterToad (https://blastertoad.itch.io/) - Programmer
MetricZero (https://metriczero.itch.io/) - Artist

The soundtrack is available for download!

Tracks:
Prom Knight
Yard Sail
Dragon Drop
